name: Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita
storyline: A new story featuring the 11 idols of the Shining Agency. A "love simulation game" that explores Haruka's growth as a composer and her love story with the idol of the player's choosing.
summary:
Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita, the next game in the visual novel series, was announced in 2016. Originally, it was meant to be released on the PS Vita, but Broccoli announced in 2019 that development for the Vita had been cancelled and that it would continue to be developed for the Nintendo Switch.

Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Dolce Vita will be a completely new work, and will feature a new story about the 11 idols at Shining Agency.
